attributes.action: Force Israel to stop Palestinians being evicted in Sheikh-Jarrah in Jerusalem.
attributes.additional_details: British government has a greater influence on the Israeli authorities. It is time for it to stand with the Palestinian rights to stay homes and not being evicted.
attributes.background: Put excessive pressure on the Israeli authorities to stop Palestinians being evicted from their own homes in Sheikh Jarrah in Jerusalem.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Condemn Israel for their treatment of Palestine and Palestinians: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585309

Introduce sanctions against Israel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585314
